==Trivia==
* This soundtrack is guaranteed to play when the player either enters the part of the Nameless Ruins subarea near "The Two Strange Bells" or had visited it last before logging into the game. ''The Long Lost Days'' then plays on loop after this soundtrack finishes or after exiting combat in the subarea.
* <section begin="NamelessRuinsTheme2" />The following soundtracks share a theme:
** [[Ripples of the Past]]
** [[The Long Lost Days]]
** [[Undercurrents of Hostility]]<section end="NamelessRuinsTheme2" />
